file_content.text: You're the only reason Anchorhead is still here. Thank you.
You don't have to worry about the Mandalorians. They were no match for a Jedi.
The outpost no longer has to fear the Mandalorians.
You don't have to worry about the Mandalorians anymore. I took care of it.
Good news, Ledo. Yours truly just cleaned up that little Mando mess of yours.
I knew you wouldn't let me down!
Here. Take this. I know you didn't ask for a reward, but I feel like I should give you something.
Here's the reward I promised you. I took up a collection with all the local merchants. I think you'll be satisfied.
Thank you. All of Anchorhead is in your debt.
Hurry. You need to stop the Mandalorians before they go to war against Anchorhead!
Is everything okay? You look like something's bothering you.
I sense you are troubled.
Something wrong, pal? You're skittish as a Jawa.
That obvious, huh? Ledo. Ledo Melnic. I'm a magistrate.
Supposed to keep things orderly here. But recently, I sort of... put most of Anchorhead in danger.
Should have known better than to stand up to those Mandalorians.
Why is that?
Let me take care of this.
That rarely ends well.
I just hope something can be done before it's too late.
A few Mandalorians were shaking down merchants. I told security to run them off whenever they showed up.
Now the Mandos have crippled three of my officers and started converting an old storage facility into a siege-proof bunker.
They're about to go to war against security, the militia, anyone who won't give them the run of Anchorhead. Someone needs to clear them out, or we're done for.
I'll do it.
That's how to stand up to a bully! My job would be so much easier with more people like you around.
What do I get out of this?
Oh. I didn't realize Jedi were so, ah, self-serving. But don't worry. I'll make sure you're well compensated.
What do I get out of this?
I'm sure I can find suitable compensation for you. I guess it's only fair.
Get inside that bunker and take those Mandos down--don't know how many there are or what they've done to the place, but it won't be pretty.
And watch out for their leader--he's got a reputation for hunting Trandoshans, rancors... not to mention Jedi.
I can't help. [Refuse quest]
Oh. That's not good. You were kind of my last hope. Come back if you change your mind.
I'm too busy to talk. Being magistrate is a full-time job, you know.
